task.title: Generate Report
task.shortdesc: Generate a report from query results, in CSV format.

taskbody.context: From a Query tab in the Query Project window, or from the Query History window with a query selected:

step.stepresult: This will generate the Report window, with a tab for Report Format and Result Sets.

step.cmd: In the Report Format tab, specify Report Sections in the Report Outline field on the left, and edit options for each section in the fields on the right, according to .
Select the Results Sets tab at the top of the window.
step.stepresult: A list of the searches performed during the query will be displayed, with the Session name and # of Results for each set. This list may take a moment to generate fully. To change display options for this list, click on the menu button to the right of the column headings.

step.cmd: Select the Result Sets you would like to report on by clicking the check box to the left of each Result Set.

stepresult.note: By default, all Result Sets are selected. You may Deselect all result sets or Hide empty result sets by using the check boxes.

step.cmd: If you do not wish to generate a report at this time, click Close. To continue generating, click Save Report....
Specify a file name and destination directory for your report file and click Save, or click Cancel to return to the Report window without generating a report.
step.stepresult: Once you click Save, the report will be written to the specified directory and will open in your system's default editor for CSV files.To prevent future reports from opening as soon as they are generated, deselect the Open report when done option.
